title.rendered: Athenahealth and Smile Foundation launch Smile on Wheels mobile health unit in Chennai

content.rendered:
In partnership with Athena health, Smile Foundation announced the launch of Smile On Wheels primary healthcare service in the slums and remote areas of Chennai.

The vehicle, fully equipped with professional and experienced doctors, nurses and medication is set to provide free healthcare facilities to KPK Nagar, Sundaresan Salai, Thiruvaluvar Nagar, Bharathi Nagar, Bharma Colony, targeting about 88,000 beneficiaries.
